cab.content: JLiLiJL E T.BATTLE SITUATION - IJVEEINQ - 11th JULY, 1918.U JifESTERK FRONT.Aa a result of patrol encounters this morning in the neighbourhood of IviERRIS, Australian troops captured about 70 prisoners: otherwise the situation Is unchanged.2. On the FRENCH FRONT the situation is unchanged.ITALIAN FRONT. There is nothing of interest to report..General Staff,v;/ar Office, 11th JUly, 1918*Issued at 6*30 p.m.
